nodes.text: The Cadma system was located in the Centrality, a sector in the Slice portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was situated on the hyperlane known as the Cadma Conduit, which connected it to the Lekua and Zebitrope systems. The system also shared its name with the Centrality's neighboring Cadma sector, through which the Cadma Conduit passed.
The Cadma system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square T-8.
